channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Hundreds gather at high school stadium to honor the many lost to deadly Texas floods
item.description: Several hundred people have gathered for a worship ceremony at a high school stadium in Texas. The vigil was held Wednesday evening to remember of the at least 120 people who died in the catastrophic flash floods over the July Fourth holiday.

item.title: Heroics of Texas camp counselors cast spotlight on those who oversee millions of US kids each summer
